Welcome to CRESTLEX 3.0

On behalf of Harvard, Navajo Technical University, Google, and Edge Impulse, welcome to our workshop on CReating Effective STem Learning EXperiences! We hope that you will learn how to use the art of machine learning and artificial intelligence in your communities, empowering your students, classmates, and members of the Navajo Nation at-large to think it, make it, and then dream bigger!

Throughout our week-long workshop, you will have the opportunity to hear from leading experts in computer science ğŸ‘©ğŸ»â€ğŸ’» from Google, master the fundamentals of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) with instructors ğŸ‘¨ğŸ¾â€ğŸ« from Harvard, explore opportunities to engage with AI and ML at home ğŸ  with a hand from students and faculty at Navajo Tech, and launch your own ML apps ğŸ› ğŸš€ with industry leaders at Edge Impulse.

Introduce Yourself

Weâ€™ll move into smaller groups via breakout rooms in Zoom.

Use the following questions to introduce yourself to your fellow workshop members:

  • What is your name?
  • Where are you located?
  • Are you a student or teacher?
  • What grade are you in? (Or what grade and subjects do you teach?)
  • What do you hope to learn?
